document.full_text: u.s. athletics agent mark block has been suspended for 10 years for his participation in the trading and trafficking of prohibited substances, the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) said on friday.
document.title: u.s. athletics agent suspended for 10 years
lines_and_colors: u.s. athletics agent mark block has been suspended for 10 years for his participation in the trading and trafficking of prohibited substances, the u.s. anti-doping agency (usada) said on friday.
